report.title: ACN Mission Counts Year to Date (deprecate)
Canceled Mission Detail
report.descriptionText: Number of canceled mission legs by month and the cancelation reason. The percentages are percent of all canceled missions. You can choose to include linking legs (with other organizations), and only missions that were coordinated (pilot added) prior to the cancelation.

dataset.commandText: SELECT year(m.mission_date) as missionYear, month(m.mission_date) as monthNo, cancelled, count(ml.id) as legCount, ml.pilot_id, afa.id as afa_leg_id FROM mission m JOIN mission_leg ml ON (m.id = ml.mission_id) LEFT JOIN afa_leg afa ON (ml.id = afa.id)

report.title: Canceled Mission Detail
report.descriptionText: Number of canceled mission legs by month and the cancelation reason for this wing only. The percentages are percent of all canceled missions for this wing. The wing of the mission leg is determined by the pilot assigned to the mission at the time of cancelation, therefore, these counts are for coordinated missions only.

dataset.commandText: SELECT year(m.mission_date) as missionYear, month(m.mission_date) as monthNo, cancelled, count(ml.id) as legCount, ml.pilot_id, mb.wing_id, w.name as wingName FROM mission m JOIN mission_leg ml ON (m.id = ml.mission_id) JOIN member mb ON (ml.pilot_id = mb.id) JOIN wing w ON (mb.wing_id = w.id)

report.title: Canceled Mission Detail by Wing
report.descriptionText: Number of canceled mission legs by month and wing. The percentages by wing are the percent of all scheduled mission legs, the percentages by month are a percent for that month of all canceled missions. The wing of the mission leg is determined by the pilot assigned to the mission at the time of cancelation, therefore, these counts are for coordinated missions only. Linking legs with other organizations are not included.

dataset.commandText: SELECT year(m.mission_date) as missionYear, month(m.mission_date) as monthNo, wing.id as wingID, wing.name, count(ml.id) as legCount, count(cancelled) as cancelledCount FROM mission m JOIN mission_leg ml ON (m.id = ml.mission_id) JOIN member mb ON (ml.pilot_id = mb.id) JOIN wing ON (mb.wing_id = wing.id)

report.title: Monthly Mission Report Detail
report.descriptionText: Note that this summary only includes missions for which a mission report has been filed and approved. Before distributing, verify that there are no mission reports outstanding. Pilot cost is based on a fixed rate of $30 per hour.

report.title: Monthly Mission Report
report.descriptionText: Note that this summary only includes missions for which a mission report has been filed and approved. Before distributing, verify that there are no mission reports outstanding. Pilot cost is based on a fixed rate of $30 per hour.

report.title: Coordination Report: New Members Only
report.descriptionText: The following is a coordination contact list this mission leg. The list contains the names of Command Pilots who have not yet flown a mission and are based at either the origin or destination airport.

report.title: Coordination Report: All Members
report.descriptionText: The following is a coordination contact list this mission leg. The list contains the names of Command Pilots who are based at either the origin or destination airport.

report.title: Child Passengers
report.descriptionText: The following report shows mission legs for all passengers who were under 18 years of age at the time of the mission.

dataset.commandText: SELECT mr.mission_date, date_format(`mr`.`mission_date`,"%m-%d-%Y") AS `displayDate`, concat_ws(" ", p.first_name,p.last_name) as passengerName, fa.ident as origin, ta.ident as destination, (case when (mr.airline_ref_number is Not Null) then mr.airline_ref_number else "" END) as VTA, (case when (`pa`.`illness` is null) then "" else pa.illness end) AS `illness` FROM mission m JOIN mission_leg ml on (m.id = ml.mission_id) JOIN passenger pa on (m.passenger_id = pa.id) JOIN person p on (pa.person_id = p.id) JOIN mission_report mr on (ml.mission_report_id = mr.id) JOIN airport fa on (ml.from_airport_id = fa.id) JOIN airport ta on (ml.to_airport_id = ta.id) WHERE pilot_id = 4028

report.title: Origin Destination Summary Report
report.descriptionText: This report lists missions with the first origin and ultimate destination of the mission for all missions, including multi-leg missions.

report.title: Mission Legs Origin Destination Summary Report
report.descriptionText: This report lists all mission legs flown with the origin and destination of the mission leg.

report.title: Origin Destination Summary Report (ACN Legs)
report.descriptionText: This report lists missions with the first origin and ultimate destination of the mission for all missions, including multi-leg missions. This report includes ACN Legs. For non-ACN legs, the report includes only mission legs with approved mission reports. The wing represented is the wing of the pilot who flew the first non-ACN leg.

report.title: Mission Legs Origin Destination Summary Report (ACN)
report.descriptionText: This report lists all mission legs flown with the origin and destination of the mission leg. This report includes ACN legs. For non-ACN legs, the report includes only mission legs with approved mission reports.

report.title: Deceased Persons Report
report.descriptionText: Persons who are listed as being deceased.

report.title: Members Total Hours
report.descriptionText: Lists active pilot members and their flight hours on record.

dataset.commandText: SELECT concat_ws(" ",`p`.`first_name`,`p`.`last_name`) AS `personName`, m.wing_id as wingID, m.flight_status as flightStatus, pilot.total_hours as totalHours FROM person p JOIN member m ON (p.id = m.person_id) JOIN pilot ON (m.id = pilot.member_id) WHERE active = 1

report.title: Pilots Disaster Response Status
report.descriptionText: Lists pilot members and their Disaster Response Program status.

report.title: Camp Mission Legs
report.descriptionText: Lists Camp mission legs

report.title: New Members Needing Badge or Notebook
report.descriptionText: Recent members who have not yet received a badge or notebook

report.title: Command Pilots who have not Flown a Mission
report.descriptionText: Lists active command pilots who have not yet flown a mission.

report.title: Flight Status by Wing
report.descriptionText: Currently active members showing flight status by wing.

report.title: Mission Types by Wing
report.descriptionText: Mission leg counts by mission type by wing, based on approved mission reports.

report.title: Mission Counts By Member
report.descriptionText: Mission leg counts by member, based on approved mission reports.

dataset.commandText: SELECT mb.external_id as externalID, concat_ws(", ",`p`.`last_name`,`p`.`first_name`) AS `pilotName`, p.last_name as lastName, mr.mission_date as missionDate, mb.wing_id as wingID, count(ml.id) as legCount, sum(hobbs_time)/10 as hobbsTime, sum(commercial_ticket_cost) as commercialTicketCost FROM mission m JOIN mission_leg ml ON (m.id = ml.mission_id) JOIN mission_report mr ON (ml.mission_report_id = mr.id) JOIN member mb ON (ml.pilot_id = mb.id) JOIN person p ON (mb.person_id = p.id)

report.title: Member Mission Distribution
report.descriptionText: Distribution of Missions flown by Members

report.title: Permanent Member Statistics
report.descriptionText: Report of the permanent member statistics.

report.title: Permanent Member Statistics
report.descriptionText: Report of the permanent member statistics.

report.title: Permanent Mission Statistics
report.descriptionText: Report of the permanent mission statistics showing the number of mission legs.

report.title: Permanent Mission Statistics (Aircraft Hours)
report.descriptionText: Report of the permanent mission statistics showing hours flown.

report.title: Permanent Mission Statistics (Aircraft Cost)
report.descriptionText: Report of the permanent mission statistics showing the aircraft cost.

report.title: Permanent Mission Statistics (Commercial Tickets)
report.descriptionText: Report of the permanent mission statistics showing the value of commercial tickets.

report.title: Commercial Ticket Cost Tracking
report.descriptionText: Track the costs of missions paid with commercial tickets

dataset.commandText: SELECT DateTimeDisplay, date_time as datetime, audit_identity as auditidentity, event, event_reason as eventreason FROM rp_audit_logs

report.title: Member Applications for Reconciliation
report.descriptionText: Member Applications and Renewals for Reconciliation

report.title: Airport Landings
report.descriptionText: List of landings at a given airport for obtaining waivers for airport fees.
